#summary HotSpot Java Command
#sidebar TableOfContents

{{{
jcmd <pid> <command> ...

Sample:
$ jcmd

$ jcmd <pid> help

$ jcmd <pid | main class> <command | PerfCounter.print | -f filename>
}}}
